tool_description: Make up to x1000 simultaneous http request in no time. The API is Simple & high performance scraping API which minimizes the development time and multiplys the performance of your scraping project by taking the **concurrency** heavy implementation from your project to the cloud.
name: simultaneous requests maker
title: simultaneous requests maker

api_list.name: concurrent requests
api_list.description: make concurrent requests at the same time up to
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simultaneous-requests-maker.p.rapidapi.com/syncRequests"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simultaneous-requests-maker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
